answerText: Desmond David Hume[10] Desmond, played by Henry Ian Cusick, is a character on this ABC series that features the survivors of Oceanic Flight 815.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Chicago Culture Heroes and Psychopomps | 8 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: A recent episode of the television series this character appears on saw him attempt to find his "Constant" Penelope Widmore.  [10] For ten points name this Scot that was first seen working in The Swan station.
